lidolink.title: LidoLink – AI Travel Assistant
lidolink.description: A location-based travel assistant built with AI-powered recommendations. Developed real-time features to display nearby beaches, attractions, transport, and weather. Contributed as a core developer in a fast-paced startup environment.

devflow.title: DevFlow – Social Platform for Developers
devflow.description: A modern social platform for developers. Users can post, bookmark, like, and share content. GitHub login is supported, and users can follow each other to stay connected.

persisto.title: Persisto – Habit Tracking App
persisto.description: A habit tracking app where users can create and share habits, join others' habits, and stay motivated with streaks and leaderboards.

ahmedcodes.title: AhmedCodes - Portfolio Website
ahmedcodes.description: Personal portfolio website built with Gatsby and Tailwind CSS, featuring animations and responsive design.
